member.name: M:DevTalks1.Controllers.StartupController.MOTD(ViewModels.Features.Startup.MOTD.Request)
member.summary: Fetches either a joke or a quote, depending on the requested message type
member.param: Identifies the requested message type, either joke or quote
member.returns: A message of the requested type

member.summary: Fetches either a joke or a quote, depending on the requested message type
member.param: Identifies the requested message type, either joke or quote
member.returns: A message of the requested type
